name: Centric
description:
A tile-matching puzzle game with a twist! Centric puts a new spin on puzzle games by rotating the whole board, not the falling pieces! Match four or more pieces to clear them away and score points. Clear multiple pieces in a row to score even more! Round up clusters to chain together, but watch out: unsupported pieces wind up falling away! A fast, addictive game that’s sure to turn that frown upside down! Features two different skins, three music tracks, gamepad support, and a marketing blurb that revolves around bad puns!

So give it a whirl! You’ll have a whale of a time!     …no, wait… …oh, just roll with it.
